steps: step 2: Click on link Reports -> Navigate to page 'team project overview#team/*/project/*/overview'
step 3: Click on link TestRuns -> Navigate to page 'team project executions#team/*/project/*/executions'
step 4: Click on link testRunDetails (ExecutionDetail) -> Navigate to page 'team project executions#team/*/project/*/executions/*'
step 5: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
